text: 12.32: Mt 11.19 naŋga, Lu 12.10 naŋga, Jo 7.12 naŋga, 7.52 naŋga, 1 Ti 1.13Kru mumɨŋga Krundu Ñɨŋiŋ kuyu ñamba ambɨrɨmandɨ. Hara ñamba vana kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ Got kuŋgɨ kuyɨvɨrɨmandɨ. Hara kru Gotɨndu Mavɨñɨŋiŋ kuyu ñamba ambɨrɨmandɨ hamandu ñamba vana haŋandɨhin, tɨhu naŋga mutɨhu ndahara Got kuŋgɨ maŋguyɨvɨrɨmandɨ, vami.
